pages.text:
Forest View
55+ Inspired Living in Homosassa, Florida
Located in the heart of Citrus County on the Gulf Coast, discover a serene, wooded oasis with a welcoming hometown atmosphere in beautiful Homosassa. Experience carefree, vacation-style living in a 55+ community designed for you to live beautifully. Embrace an active and social Florida lifestyle in our wonderful neighborhood on the Florida coast.
Meet for social activities and billiards in the lakefront clubhouse, the social hub of our community. Learn water aerobics in our heated swimming pool and relax in the soothing spa. Challenge friends and neighbors to a game of pickleball, bocce ball, and shuffleboard. Stroll around our scenic lakes. Experience the small-town feel of our community for a relaxing and carefree way of life.
Read More
View Homes
about 55+ Inspired Living in Homosassa, Florida
55+ Inspired Living in Homosassa, Florida
Forest View
Amenities and Activities
Experience the small-town charm and resort-style amenities at our 55+ community. Play pickleball with neighbors, dive into the outdoor pool, and enjoy fishing in our serene lakes. Stay as relaxed or active as you desire.

Forest View
Discover
Forest View is situated in Homosassa, nestled between the Gulf Coast beaches and rolling hills of the Withlacoochee region. Situated in a peaceful wooded setting, Forest View is easily accessible to banks, medical facilities, restaurants, and shopping within five miles. The community is three miles from Crystal River State Park and the wooded hiking paths of the Ozello Trail. The natural spring environment within the 210-acre Homosassa Springs Wildlife State Park, the unofficial manatee capital of the world, is located five miles to the south. Five miles to the north is the town of Crystal River, "The Gem of the Nature Coast", known for its outdoor water activities, saltwater fishing, and attractions.
Things to Do
Airports
Homosassa Springs Wildlife State Park
Monkey Island
Davis' Landing
Swim with Manatees
Yulee Sugar Mill Ruins Historic State Park
Tampa International Airport (TPA)

Forest View
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Is Homosassa, Florida, a good place to live?
Is Homosassa, Florida, a good place to live?
Homosassa, Florida, is a charming small town located on the Gulf coast of Florida, south of Crystal River. A warm climate, outdoor activities, lower cost of living, and retirement communities, make it appealing for active adults.
How much is a new manufactured home in Homosassa, Florida?
How much is a new manufactured home in Homosassa, Florida?
The cost of our quality-built manufactured homes varies. We offer many
affordable homes
with access to complimentary community amenities for even more value. Please contact our team for pricing and more information.
What recreational activities are offered at Forest View?
What recreational activities are offered at Forest View?
Forest View features exceptional recreational activities, including a swimming pool, pickleball, library, lake, dog park, and clubhouse. Enjoy fantastic
amenities
in the place you call home.
What are the best attractions in Homosassa, Florida?
What are the best attractions in Homosassa, Florida?
Forest View is close to the city’s best attractions, including Homosassa Springs Wildlife State Park, Monkey Island, Davis' Landing, Swim with Manatees, and Yulee Sugar Mill Ruins Historic State Park.
Phone:
(866) 575-9371
https://www.suncommunities.com/florida/forest-view

"The people here were great and always helpful. Love Forest View!"

Cookie Consent Manager
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
Required Cookies
These cookies are required to use this website and can't be turned off.
Show More Details
Required Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
SAP as service provider
We use the following session cookies, which are all required to enable the website to function:
"route" is used for session stickiness
"careerSiteCompanyId" is used to send the request to the correct data center
"JSESSIONID" is placed on the visitor's device during the session so the server can identify the visitor
"Load balancer cookie" (actual cookie name may vary)  prevents a visitor from bouncing from one instance to another
Advertising Cookies
These cookies serve ads that are relevant to your interests. You may freely choose to accept or decline these cookies at any time. Note that certain functionality that these third parties make available may be impacted if you do not accept these cookies.
Show More Details
Advertising Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
Google Analytics
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
Cookie Information
Privacy Policy
Terms and Conditions
Confirm My Choices
Accept All Cookies

Forest View - Amenities and Activities
Forest View - Amenities and Activities
The Florida 55+ Lifestyle You're Dreaming Of
Showcasing the natural beauty of the Florida Gulf Coast, Forest View provides resort-style amenities in our 55+ community designed for living in the present through individual and social recreation and activities.  Live a fabulous Florida retirement lifestyle with modern facilities, including our multi-use lakefront clubhouse, well-maintained regulation sporting areas, and natural green spaces and water features.  Our professional service team has perfected the formula for happy residents.
Clubhouse
You lifestyle is enhanced by our lakefront clubhouse, the social hub of our community. Play billiards and card games, check out the library, join a club, and enjoy social activities and events.
Heated Swimming Pool
Relax in comfortable lounge chairs, soak up the sun, and take a dip in our heated outdoor pool. Relax in the healing waters of the hot tub.
Pickleball
Flaunt your skills on our pickleball court, where friendly competition meets the joy of the game. Swing into action and make friends playing this fun sport.
Lakes
Take a leisurely stroll or jog and enjoy the sweet serenity of our private community lakes. You can also spend the day catch-and-release fishing.
Library

Forest View - Amenities and Activities
Forest View - Amenities and Activities
The Florida 55+ Lifestyle You're Dreaming Of
Showcasing the natural beauty of the Florida Gulf Coast, Forest View provides resort-style amenities in our 55+ community designed for living in the present through individual and social recreation and activities.  Live a fabulous Florida retirement lifestyle with modern facilities, including our multi-use lakefront clubhouse, well-maintained regulation sporting areas, and natural green spaces and water features.  Our professional service team has perfected the formula for happy residents.
Clubhouse
You lifestyle is enhanced by our lakefront clubhouse, the social hub of our community. Play billiards and card games, check out the library, join a club, and enjoy social activities and events.
Heated Swimming Pool
Relax in comfortable lounge chairs, soak up the sun, and take a dip in our heated outdoor pool. Relax in the healing waters of the hot tub.
Pickleball
Flaunt your skills on our pickleball court, where friendly competition meets the joy of the game. Swing into action and make friends playing this fun sport.
Lakes
Take a leisurely stroll or jog and enjoy the sweet serenity of our private community lakes. You can also spend the day catch-and-release fishing.
Library
Our community library offers a collection of books and resources. Find a cozy nook and dive into your favorite classic or a new novel.
Pet Friendly
Enjoy the ease of living in a pet-friendly community with a designated dog park where your furry friends can play and roam.
All Amenities
Embrace an active and inspired 55+ lifestyle in our beautiful community, located between the Gulf Coast and rolling hills of the Withlacoochee region. Whether its fishing on the lake or lazing by the pool, you can have it all.
